text.div: No narrative is provided for definitional resources. A human-readable rendering can be found in the implementation guide(s) where this resource is used.

description.value: Location on or in the body where the medication was administered. Usually used to indicate the location at which a patient was administered an injection or patch was applied. The value list PrikPlakLocationCodelijst list can serve as a starting point for coding these concepts. If both the anatomical location and administration route are filled, they should be aligned. Note: The `.id` and in addition, the `.url`, `.name` and `.title` of this ConceptMap deviate from the guidelines ('AdministrationLocation' is replaced with 'AnatomicalLocation') because it would overflow the 64-character limit

purpose.value: This BodyStructure resource represents the AdministrationLocation concept (NL-CM:9.13.23381) of Dutch [zib ('Zorginformatiebouwsteen', i.e. Health and Care Information Model) MedicationAdministration2 v3.0 (2024)](https://zibs.nl/wiki/MedicationAdministration2-v3.0(2024EN)).

definition.value: Location on or in the body where the medication was administered. Usually used to indicate the location at which a patient was administered an injection or patch was applied. The value list PrikPlakLocationCodelijst list can serve as a starting point for coding these concepts. If both the anatomical location and administration route are filled, they should be aligned.
